name: AWS re:Invent 2025
description: AWS re:Invent is a learning conference hosted by Amazon Web Services for the global cloud computing community. Join 60,000+ builders, developers, and IT leaders for five days of keynotes, training, certification opportunities, and hands-on labs. Explore the latest innovations in compute, AI/ML, serverless, containers, databases, security, and more. Connect with AWS experts, partners, and peers while discovering best practices for building and scaling cloud applications.
